013package org.apache.juneau.http.part;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArgUtils.*;
016import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
017
018import org.apache.http.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
020
021/**
022 * Basic implementation of a {@link PartIterator}.
023 *
024 * <ul class='notes'>
025 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe.
026 * </ul>
027 *
028 * <ul class='seealso'>
029 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-common">juneau-rest-common</a>
030 * </ul>
031 */
032public class BasicPartIterator implements PartIterator {
033
034   private final NameValuePair[] entries;
035   private final String name;
036   private final boolean caseInsensitive;
037
038   private int currentIndex;
039
040   /**
041    * Creates a new part iterator.
042    *
043    * @param parts An array of parts over which to iterate.
044    * @param name The name of the parts over which to iterate, or <jk>null</jk> for all.
045    * @param caseInsensitive Use case-insensitive matching for part name.
046    */
047   public BasicPartIterator(NameValuePair[] parts, String name, boolean caseInsensitive) {
048      this.entries = assertArgNotNull("parts", parts);
049      this.name = name;
050      this.caseInsensitive = caseInsensitive;
051      this.currentIndex = findNext(-1);
052   }
053
054   private int findNext(int pos) {
055
056      int from = pos;
057
058      int to = entries.length - 1;
059      boolean found = false;
060      while (!found && (from < to)) {
061         from++;
062         found = filter(from);
063      }
064
065      return found ? from : -1;
066   }
067
068   private boolean filter(int index) {
069      return (name == null) || eq(name, entries[index].getName());
070   }
071
072   @Override /* Iterator */
073   public boolean hasNext() {
074      return (currentIndex >= 0);
075   }
076
077   @Override /* Iterator */
078   public NameValuePair next() throws NoSuchElementException {
079
080      int current = currentIndex;
081
082      if (current < 0)
083         throw new NoSuchElementException("Iteration already finished.");
084
085      currentIndex = findNext(current);
086
087      return entries[current];
088   }
089
090   /**
091    * Not supported.
092    */
093   @Override /* Iterator */
094   public void remove() throws UnsupportedOperationException {
095      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported.");
096   }
097
098   private boolean eq(String s1, String s2) {
099      return StringUtils.eq(caseInsensitive, s1, s2);
100   }
101}
